name: subordinately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has a lower position or is less important : In this instance, the generation gap in the novel is only subordinately important.
More examplesFewer examplesLeave in force the local authorities if they can be subordinately useful.The building is being treated subordinately and lacks the necessary facilities.His followers stood subordinately around him, silent and staring.Although he was consulted on important issues, he acted subordinately to the Chief Minister.
